title: 86/163/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 April 1986 refusing to approve a programme for the improvement of the conditions under which milk products are processed and marketed in Denmark pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 April 1986
refusing to approve a programme for the improvement of the conditions under which milk products are processed and marketed in Denmark pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Danish text is authentic)
(86/163/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Approval of the programme to improve the conditions under which milk products are processed and marketed, notified on 6 February 1985 by the Danish Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, is hereby refused.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1985, p. 1.
